v.desc: Defines the Captcha cookie validity lifetime in minutes. This setting is only applicable to Premium_AzureFrontDoor. Value must be an integer between 5 and 1440 with the default value being 30.

ex.pth: /Get all Policies in a Resource Group/parameters/api-version
